mapper.select: SELECT C.CMT_IDX, C.PST_IDX, C.CMT_CONT, C.CMT_ANS, C.CMT_REGDATE, COALESCE(U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BUSS_NICKNAME) AS AUTHOR_NICKNAME FROM PUB_CMT C LEFT JOIN PUB_USER U ON C.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX LEFT JOIN PUB_BUSS B ON C.BUSS_IDX = B.BUSS_IDX WHERE C.CMT_DELYN = 'N' AND C.PST_IDX = #{pstIdx} ORDER BY C.CMT_REGDATE DESC;
